about_the_game:
Try out a content-packed demo of an As We Descend run.

In our sci-fi spin on feudalism known as "Raygun Feudalism", you must protect the last city of humankind as the Warden of the Wall. Navigate treacherous politics and keep your wits about you on the battlefield. You'll need to balance both to achieve victory in this strategy roguelike.

Assemble your forces

Recruit new units by utilizing scavenged technology. Each squad of units is a unique archetype with its own set of cards which can be added, removed, and upgraded. Deploy the right composition of forces in order to tailor your deck for success against each battle encounter.

Plan and strategize

The city is the last bastion of humanity and serves as your main base. Familiarize yourself with its denizens so you can survive its feudal politics and gain allies. Roll the dice to compel those in the city to your cause. Make the most of your limited time and resources so you can prepare sufficiently for the future.

Outsmart your foes

Against titanic enemies, you must rely on not just strength but wit. Adapt your tactics by reacting to enemy intents. Master the combat zone system: reposition your forces between the Guard Zone and the Support Zone in order to dodge enemy attacks and set up a defensive line.

React to randomized runs

Each descent is a new challenge, pitting you against a new face of the twisting world as you attempt to break through to the core. New allies and encounters await you. Even if you fail, you will uncover more secrets and begin the next journey with more knowledge and tools to delve ever deeper.

Note: Some content in this demo may vary from the final game.

short_description: The roguelike deckbuilder with the soul of a strategy game. Recruit and upgrade your forces. Deploy them to counter monstrous foes in card-slinging battles. Play your cards carefully in the treacherous city. Against all odds, will you bear the torch of humanity?
